compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject.

compliant.section: 1.1本私隱條例介紹了Lalamove及其關聯公司（稱為“我們”、“我們的”和“Lalamove”）如何收集、儲存、處理、轉移和使用閣下的個人資料以及就該個人資料閣下享有哪些相應權利。
compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject

compliant.section: 就本私隱條例而言，Lalamove 是指在閣下收到本私隱條例之日為閣下提供服務的特定實體。 （參見本協議附錄二Lalamove實體列表 ） 。
compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject.

non_compliant.section: 1.2本隱私政策涉及我們在閣下使用或訪問我們的網路應用程式、移動應用程式（合稱 "應用程式"）和我們的網站（https://www.
non_compliant.legal provisions: The information to be provided to the data subject should also include the contact details of the controller and the data protection officer (if any).
non_compliant.amend: This section should clearly state the contact details of the data controller and the data protection officer (if any). For example, it could be amended to: '1.2 This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you use or access our website (https://www.[website address]), mobile applications ('Apps'), and other online services that link to this Privacy Policy (collectively, the 'Services'). This policy also applies to information we collect in other ways, such as offline or through email.  You can contact us at [email address] or [phone number] with any questions. Our Data Protection Officer can be reached at [email address] or [phone number].'
